function.name: ranked_search
function.description: Search documents and rank results by relevance.

name: ranked_search
short_description: Search documents and rank results by relevance.
long_description: Performs a search across documents and ranks results based on the frequency of query terms.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

example_user_queries: Get top documents related to error
